title: What the hell
content: I went ahead and added a wiki entry for [sans serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420125242/http:/typophile.com/wiki/sans%20serif) as well. Get in there and expand, edit, and clarify it; right now it's rife with my own personal opinions, which some of you are sure to find violently offensive. You get what you pay for!
author: Forrest L Norvell
